title: Voice AI vs Traditional Receptionist: The Complete 2025 Cost Comparison
excerpt: Should you hire a receptionist or use AI? This analysis breaks down the true costs of both options, including hidden expenses most business owners overlook.

seo.title: Voice AI vs Traditional Receptionist: Complete 2025 Cost Comparison
seo.description: Should you hire a receptionist or use AI? This analysis breaks down the true costs including hidden expenses. AI costs 80-95% less with 4x the coverage.
